subject: Rul All tests problem
msgSnippet: Hi, I am using JUnitEE and created a JUnit test suite to test an EJB. In the setUp(), I create the stateless session bean and in the tearDown(), I remove it.
messageBody:
Hi,

I am using JUnitEE and created a JUnit test suite to test an EJB.
In the setUp(), I create the stateless session bean and in the tearDown(), I remove it.

This works correctly if I run only one test case which is built like:
suite.add(new MyTestCase("testMethod1"));

If I try to run all the test cases which are built like this:

suite.add(new MyTestCase("testMethod1"));
suite.add(new MyTestCase("testMethod2"));
..

then, the EJBs dont seem to get removed... the EJB pool goes out of limit if I run "Run All" again and again. As I said earilier, setUp() and tearDown() methods of MyTestCase are having calls of home.create() and bean.remove() types (to create and remove the bean respectively).

Can anyone see what could be going wrong here?
I am stuck for a week on this now.
Thanks a lot.
